en_tdlr: MolCode is an equivariant generative framework for molecular graph-structure co-design, which enables more accurate modeling of 2D topology and 3D geometry information through roto-translation equivariance. Experimental results show that MolCode outperforms previous methods on tasks such as de novo molecule design, targeted molecule discovery, and property prediction.
